lines.text: Sydney, If you really want to dis someone, you have to stick with the 'yo mamma jokes', here, I'll tell you one, "Yo mamma's so big, that when she was hit by a school bus, she turned around and said, 'stop throwing them rocks!'"
How 'bout this one? 'Your mamma's teeth are so yellow, that when she smiled, all the cars in the road stoped!'

[Darryl laughing]
That's really funny son, now GO TO YOUR ROOM, I don't want you to be talking about my mamma like that!
[Sydney disobeys Darryl and meets up with a guy she's been chatting with on the internet]

[van window opens]
Oh my god! YOU'RE 'Hotguy16'?
That's right! Didn't I tell you not to go in those chatrooms? Get in the car!
God better have your soul 'cause your behind is mine!
Did somebody order a naked white woman?
I'm not afraid of anything.
Ok, how 'bout this tarantula?
Arachnophobia - - fear of spiders.
That doesn't scare me.
Then what about this snake?
Snakephobia - - fear of snakes.
That doesn't scare me either.

[pulls out video tapes]
Ok, what about these movies..."When Harry Met Sally", "Sleepless In Seattle", and "You've Got Mail"?
Eeeeek! Get those away from me!
Megaphobia - - fear of Meg Ryan movies.
You two are busier than a pallbearer at the Kennedy compound
I'm one bad mother...
You know, I think that's a girls coat.
Ain't no thang but a chicken wang!
